Download explanation: Umbhalo wakho ulungile manje, siwuthumela nge-imeyili kuwe
Subject: Isihloko
closed:
##siyabonga kubaxhasi abangu-{{total}}!

Sikuvalile lesi senzo, kodwa umsebenzi wethu awupheli lapha, ngakho-ke sicela **ushiye i-imeyili yakho ukuze uhlale unolwazi ngezinyathelo ezilandelayo**

consent.confirm: <0>Uqinisekile?</0><1>Uma ukhetha 'Cha', ngeke ukwazi ukuthola ukuthi lo mkhankaso uyaphumelela yini, noma uma kunenye isinyathelo esidingeka ukuba sithathe ukuze siwinile. Uma ukhetha 'Yebo' sizokugcina ulwazi ngalokhu kanye nemikhankaso yethu ephuthumayo.</1><2>Ungazikhipha noma kunini.</2>
consent.confirmAction:
Sicela uthole i-imeyili manje bese uchofoza isixhumanisi esikuqukethe (bheka ifolda yakho yemfucuza!).
 Kungaleso sikhathi lapho isenzo sakho sizobalwa!
Ukuqinisekiswa kwakho kubalulekile ukuze lesi senzo sibe nesisindo esipolitiki. Lokhu kuqinisekisa ukuthi kukhona umuntu wangempela ngemuva kwazo zonke izethulo. Sizolinda ukuqinisekiswa kwakho...
consent.confirmOptIn: Ungakhohlwa ukuhlola ibhokisi lakho leposi (kufaka ifolda yemfucuza!) bese uqinisekisa ukubhaliswa kwakho kwe-imeyili
consent.implicit: Thumela leli fomu ukuze uthole ama-imeyili avela ku-{{name}}
consent.intro: Thola okwengeziwe ngemikhankaso yethu, izenzo kanye nokuqhubeka kwe-{{campaign}}
consent.opt-in: Yebo, ngifuna u-{{partner}} angigcine nginolwazi nge-imeyili
consent.opt-in-both: Yebo, ngifuna u-{{partner}} no-{{lead}} bangigcine nginolwazi nge-imeyili
consent.opt-out: Cha, ungathumi ama-imeyili noma ungigcine nginolwazi esikhathini esizayo
consent.processing: Ulwazi lwakho lomuntu siqu luzogcinwa luyimfihlo futhi luphephe. Ngokuthumela ulwazi uyavuma ukusetshenziswa kwedatha namakhukhi ngokuvumelana ne-<1>inqubomgomo yethu yobumfihlo</1>
consent.processing-nocookie: Ulwazi lwakho lomuntu siqu luzogcinwa luyimfihlo futhi luphephe. Ngokuthumela ulwazi uyavuma ukusetshenziswa kwedatha ngokuvumelana ne-<1>inqubomgomo yethu yobumfihlo</1>
consent.required: Imvume yakho iyadingeka ukuze ubambe iqhaza

image.benefit: Ukwengeza isithombe sokuthumela - futhi ongabelana ngaso esinyat helweni esilandelayo - kuzokwenza isenzo sakho sibe nethonya elikhulu

postcode.notFound: le khodi yeposi ibonakala ingekho ezweni lakho

reminder.intro: Siyazi, uhulumeni wakho ucelwa ulwazi oluningi. Sizokuthumela i-imeyili eyodwa ukukukhumbuza ukuthi ugcwalise ifomu kamuva

share.intro: Kuhle, ususayinile üëç. Ukukhulisa umthelela wakho, yabelana kabanzi ukuze uqinisekise ukuthi wonke umuntu uyabona lesi sicelo üôè.
share.title: Ucishe waqeda! Thatha isinyathelo esilandelayo.

country.empty: Khetha elinye izwe, akekho umuntu ongaxhumana naye ku-{{country}}
